mapper.select:
select count(*) from goods
where ${searchType} like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
select goods.*, min(ot_price) as gs_price from goods join `option` on goods.gs_num = `option`.ot_gs_num where gs_num = #{gs_num} group by gs_num
select * from `option` where ot_gs_num = #{gs_num} order by ot_price
select * from basket where bs_mb_num = #{bs_mb_num} and bs_ot_num = #{bs_ot_num} and bs_expir_date > now()
select * from basket join `option` on basket.bs_ot_num = `option`.ot_num join goods on `option`.ot_gs_num = goods.gs_num where bs_mb_num = #{mb_num} and bs_expir_date > now();
select * from basket where bs_num = #{bs_num} and bs_mb_num = #{bs_mb_num}
mapper.insert: insert into basket(bs_mb_num, bs_ot_num, bs_amount, bs_expir_date) values(#{bs_mb_num},#{bs_ot_num},#{bs_amount},#{bs_expir_date})
mapper.delete: delete from basket where bs_num = #{bs_num} and bs_mb_num = #{bs_mb_num}
